mapper.update: UPDATE person SET company_code = #{companyCode}, person_name = #{personName}, person_type = #{personType}, is_certified = #{isCertified}, phone = #{phone}, avatar_file_id = #{avatarFileId}, cert_file_id = #{certFileId}, cert_expire_date = #{certExpireDate}, sms_notify = #{smsNotify}, updated_at = NOW(3) WHERE id = #{id}
